title: The Jewels of Rislingaard (Book one: Longmeadow's Rarely Used, Nearly Forgotten, and Generally Unnecessary Knowledge and Facts
description: An amazing book, sent from his uncle, leads Danny Engle and his best friend and blossoming love interest, Heather, on a fantastic journey. From the wilderness of Northwestern Ontario, to Montreal and Boston, the teens quest for a magical Triad of jewels, meeting mythical Scandinavian trolls and battling an enigmatic Dark force along the way. Welcome to book one of 'Longmeadow's Rarely Used, Nearly Forgotten, and Generally Unnecessary knowledge and Facts'.
author: Ken Janisch
